title: Autotrader Canada Scraper
description: Extract vehicle listings from Autotrader.ca with home delivery options. Filter by make, model, year, price, mileage, and location across Canadian provinces.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Autotrader.ca search URL. Overrides other filters if provided.

province.title: Province
province.description: Canadian province code (e.g., on, bc, ab, qc).

minPrice.title: Minimum Price (CAD)
minPrice.description: Minimum listing price in Canadian dollars.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (CAD)
maxPrice.description: Maximum listing price in Canadian dollars.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of vehicle listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended.
